### Proof Functions

- **`proof fn lemma_scale_distributes_over_add`** — [vec2/ops.rs:27](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L27)
  > scale(s, a + b) ≡ scale(s, a) + scale(s, b)
- **`proof fn lemma_scale_add_distributes`** — [vec2/ops.rs:36](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L36)
  > scale(s + t, a) ≡ scale(s, a) + scale(t, a)
- **`proof fn lemma_scale_identity`** — [vec2/ops.rs:45](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L45)
  > scale(1, a) ≡ a
- **`proof fn lemma_scale_zero_scalar`** — [vec2/ops.rs:54](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L54)
  > scale(0, a) ≡ zero
- **`proof fn lemma_scale_zero_vec`** — [vec2/ops.rs:63](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L63)
  > scale(s, zero) ≡ zero
- **`proof fn lemma_scale_congruence`** — [vec2/ops.rs:72](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L72)
  > a ≡ b implies scale(s, a) ≡ scale(s, b)
- **`proof fn lemma_scale_associative`** — [vec2/ops.rs:83](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L83)
  > scale(s, scale(t, a)) ≡ scale(s * t, a)
- **`proof fn lemma_scale_neg_scalar`** — [vec2/ops.rs:95](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L95)
  > scale(-s, a) ≡ -scale(s, a)
- **`proof fn lemma_scale_neg_vec`** — [vec2/ops.rs:104](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L104)
  > scale(s, -a) ≡ -scale(s, a)
- **`proof fn lemma_scale_sub_distributes`** — [vec2/ops.rs:113](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L113)
  > scale(s, a - b) ≡ scale(s, a) - scale(s, b)
- **`proof fn lemma_dot_commutative`** — [vec2/ops.rs:126](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L126)
  > dot(a, b) ≡ dot(b, a)
- **`proof fn lemma_dot_zero_right`** — [vec2/ops.rs:139](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L139)
  > dot(a, zero) ≡ 0
- **`proof fn lemma_dot_zero_left`** — [vec2/ops.rs:158](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L158)
  > dot(zero, a) ≡ 0
- **`proof fn lemma_dot_distributes_right`** — [vec2/ops.rs:177](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L177)
  > dot(a, b + c) ≡ dot(a, b) + dot(a, c)
- **`proof fn lemma_dot_distributes_left`** — [vec2/ops.rs:202](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L202)
  > dot(a + b, c) ≡ dot(a, c) + dot(b, c)
- **`proof fn lemma_dot_scale_left`** — [vec2/ops.rs:227](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L227)
  > dot(scale(s, a), b) ≡ s * dot(a, b)
- **`proof fn lemma_dot_scale_right`** — [vec2/ops.rs:255](./src/vec2/ops.rs#L255)
  > dot(a, scale(s, b)) ≡ s * dot(a, b)
